head.title: Paid Notice: Memorials COHEN, HARRIS DAVID

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Memorials COHEN, HARRIS DAVID

block.p: COHEN-Harris David. January 25, 1967 to August 13, 1985. Fifteen sad years since the accident. We will never forget you. Our memories are beautiful, our hearts are broken. Much love, Mom, Dad, Jonathan and Lisa
COHEN-Harris. 1/25/67-8/13/85. It's been 15 years and a million tears. I think of you often and miss you every day. You would be proud of mom and dad. Always in my thoughts. Love, Jonathan

COHEN-Harris David. January 25, 1967 to August 13, 1985. Fifteen sad years since the accident. We will never forget you. Our memories are beautiful, our hearts are broken. Much love, Mom, Dad, Jonathan and Lisa
COHEN-Harris. 1/25/67-8/13/85. It's been 15 years and a million tears. I think of you often and miss you every day. You would be proud of mom and dad. Always in my thoughts. Love, Jonathan
